ðŸ“– Summary: Mate Engine is a free, open-source, and moddable alternative to Desktop Mate, designed to provide users with more freedom and fewer limitations. It supports custom VRM avatars, custom shaders, and offers a variety of features not found in Desktop Mate, such as animation modding and built-in SDK.
